summary:
Its 2017, but that dosent mean that everyone should have a Beast/Expensive computer.
This guide will try its best to improve your game quality while increasing the performance and overhaul enjoyability of your game.
Helpfull for low to high end gamer`s
descriptionHtml:
SO LETS START
1-Default skyrim settings

I recommend you this settings:
 
Resolution: 1280x720(good perforamnce, good quality, still is HD)

Texture Quality:High( if you want to save memory use medium, looks almost the same : P  )

Radial Blur Quality: Low

Shadow Detail: LOW!!!( Really even if you have a badass pc....skyrim shadows are sh*t, put it in low and save some tasty fps )

Decal Quantity:Medium

Water Reflections:This is optional it gives me a 5% boost on performance when turned off, but if you like the effects turn it on

View Distances: I recommend using the default medium quality for view distance, but tweak the object fade and actor fade and put it on 4 and 8 accordaly
put grass fade on 1 or 2 for extra performance, and toggle On Object Detail Fade since it gives a small fps boost.

THOSE ARE THE SETTINGS I RECOMMNED FOR LOOKS AND PERFORMANCE

Lets start it STABILITY SINCE SPECIAL EDITION IS MORE STABLE 

Recommended mods:
ENBoost   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38649?

Skyrim Memory Patch   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50305/?

Skyrim Project Optimization   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?

Safety Load   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465/?

Bug fixes   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76747/?

Crash fixes    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72725/?

Continue Game No Crash     http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78557/?

LOOT    https://loot.github.io/ (FOR ORGANIZING YOUR MODS AND PREVENT CONFLICTS AND CRASHES)

TES5EDIT   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/? (CLEAN MODS TO PREVENT CONFLICTS AND CRASHES)

I GUESS THAT COVERS ALL THE STABILITY PART : D
LETS START IT PERFORMANCE AND THEN THE LOOKS....just wait the better comes at the end........

Skyrim Project Optimization   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/? (YES AGAIN I JUST PUT THIS MOD HERE 2 CUZ IT ALSO GIVES FPS)

Colorful Lights - No Shadows - More FPS   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10789/?

Optimizer Textures   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/? 

Skyrim Performance PLUS  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6387/?

Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/736/?

Remove Underwater Grass    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55240/?

Vanilla Reduced Textures    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14504/? OR Optimized Vanilla Textures   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57353/? (CHOOSE ONE PLZ)

NOW SINCE I CANT REMENBER NOTHING MORE LETS START IT THE GRAPHICS...............

In this part  like i sayd at the start i will try to make normal skyrim look like special edtion, adding similar effect present on the special edition of the game

SPECIAL EDITION comes it Remastered art and effects like new and more grass etc... so i recommend the Skyrim Flora Overhaul mod that adds new plants and grass and also textures for the trees etc.    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?

Skyrim Reloaded   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75954/? (THIS WILL ADD NEW EFFECTS SIMILAR TO SPECIAL EDITION TO THE GAME AND CAN BE TWEAKED)

Vivid Weathers    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?(TO MATCH THE NEW RAINS AND SNOW EFFECTS OF THE SPECIAL EDITION)

Dynamic depth of field   http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/? ( JUST LIKE SPECIAL EDITION)

Realistic Water Two     http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?  ( FOR BETTER WATER TEXTURES LIKE SPECIAL EDITION)

Skyrim HD - 2K Textures    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/? ( I RECOMMEND LITE VERSION SINCE IN 720P RESOLUTION FULL VERSION HAS NO EFFECT )

aMidianBorn Book of Silence    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/? (I RECOMMEND TO INSTALL ALL PACKS)

Static Mesh Improvement Mod     http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?

For better quality i recommend to use an ENB

SO YOU CAN USE MINE....yes im promoting myself : P

HECATE ENB     http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81808/?  ( 1-5 FPS HIT, IT SCREENSHOTS TO SEE THAT IS NOT A LIE LIKE 99% OF PERFORMANCE ENB`S ON THE NEXUS.

PLZ READ ALL THE MOD PAGES SO YOU CAN INSTALL ALL OF THEM IT NO PROBLEM : D
SO TO END , I KNOW ITS IMPOSSIBLE TO COMPLETY TRANSFORM DEFAULT SKYRIM TO SPECIAL EDITION BUT I HOPE IT THIS GUIDE WE ALL CAN MAKE OUR GAME LOOK A LITTLE BETTER AND IT IMPROVED PERFORMANCE, PLZ UNDERSTANT THIS IS NOT AN ULTIMADE 4K HD SKYRIM ULTRA EXTREME GRAPHICS
THIS IS JUST A GUIDE IT IMPROVED PERFORMANCE AND LOOKS FOR PEOPLE LIKE ME THAT DONT HAVE A VERY GOOD COMPUTER OR A VERY GOOD CARD.
I WILL UPDATE THIS ANY TIME I CAN OR ANY TIME I DISCOVER A NEW THING TO ADD
author: hecatept
